name: Microsoft Corporation
description: Global technology company focused on software, cloud services, productivity tools, and hardware.

ceo.name: Satya Nadella
ceo.bio: Satya Nadella is an Indian-American business executive who has been the CEO of Microsoft since 2014, transforming the company's culture and driving cloud computing growth.
